articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Canada adds 230700 jobs in June, unemployment falls to 7.8% - Reuters
articles.description: Canada added more jobs that expected in June, bringing employment within 1.8% of pre-pandemic levels, though all the gains were in part-time work, Statistics Canada data showed on Friday.
articles.content: People wait in line for resume critique and career assessment sessions at the 2014 Spring National Job Fair and Training Expo in Toronto, April 3, 2014. REUTERS/Aaron HarrisOTTAWA, July 9 (Reuters) -… [+1273 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens higher on energy boost, upbeat job data - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened higher on Friday, as energy stocks tracked stronger crude prices, while government data showed the nation added more jobs than expected in June.
articles.content:

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens lower as energy stocks weigh - Reuters.com
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened lower on Thursday, weighed by a drop in energy stocks as crude prices extended losses on supply uncertainty.

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX gain after cannabis producer OrganiGram's strong results - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index rose on Tuesday, with cannabis-related stocks leading the charge, cheered by upbeat earnings from OrganiGram Holdings.
